cards.name: Greatjon's Vanguard
cards.text:
No attachments.
While there are fewer than 3 plots in your used pile, Greatjon's Vanguard gets +2 STR and gains renown.

cards.name: Winterfell Crypt
cards.text: Reaction: After a unique [stark] character you control is killed or sacrificed during the challenges phase, sacrifice Winterfell Crypt to choose a character with equal or lower printed STR. At the end of the phase, if that character is still in play, shuffle it back into its owner's deck.

cards.name: Roseroad Patrol
cards.text:
No attachments.
While you control a character with the highest STR in play, Roseroad Patrol gains stealth.

cards.name: Pulling the Strings
cards.text: When Revealed: Choose an Edict, Kingdom, or Scheme plot card in an opponent's used pile. Initiate the when revealed ability on that card as if you had just revealed it.

cards.name: Chett
cards.text: No attachments except Weapon. Dominance Action: Kneel a Steward character to return a Direwolf or Raven card from your discard pile to your hand. (Limit once per phase.)

cards.name: Northern Rookery
cards.text: Reaction: After you marshal Northern Rookery, draw 1 card. +1 Reserve.

cards.name: Kingswood
cards.text: During [power] challenges in which you are the defending player, each attacking character gets -1 STR. Forced Reaction: After you lose a [power] challenge, sacrifice Kingswood.

cards.name: Stinking Drunk
cards.text: Opponent's character only. Reaction: After attached character stands, sacrifice Stinking Drunk to kneel that character.

cards.name: Bronn
cards.text: During a challenge in which you are the defending player, Bronn gains a [military], an [intrigue], and a [power] icon. Marshaling Action: Pay 1 gold to take control of Bronn. (Any player may initiate this ability.)

cards.name: Trial by Combat
cards.text: Interrupt: When claim is applied for an [intrigue] challenge, apply [military] claim instead.
cards.flavor: "The gods know the truth of my innocence. I will have their verdict, not the judgment of men." <cite>Tyrion Lannister</cite>

cards.name: Raider from Pyke
cards.text: Each Weapon card in your hand gains ambush (X). X is that card's printed cost.

cards.name: Iron Mines
cards.text: Interrupt: When a character would be killed, sacrifice Iron Mines to save that character.
cards.flavor: In those days, the ironborn did not work mines; that was labor for the captives brought back from the hostings.

cards.name: Mirri Maz Duur
cards.text: Interrupt: When claim is applied for a challenge in which Mirri Maz Duur is attacking alone, choose a character controlled by the losing opponent. Instead of the normal claim effects, kill that character.
cards.flavor: "The Great Shepherd sent me to earth to heal his lambs, wherever I might find them."

cards.name: Blood Magic Ritual
cards.text: Interrupt: When a non-Army character would be killed, save it. Then, attach Blood Magic Ritual to that character as a Condition attachment with the text: "Terminal. Treat attached character's printed text box as if it were blank (except for Traits)."

cards.name: Knights of the Sun
cards.text: No attachments except Weapon. While there are 3 or more plot cards in your used pile, Knights of the Sun gains renown.

cards.name: Vengeance for Elia
cards.text: Interrupt: When claim is applied for a challenge in which you are the defending player, choose an opponent. That player must satisfy the normal claim effect instead of you as if he or she were the defending player.

cards.name: Street of Steel
cards.text: Reaction: After you win a [military] challenge, kneel your faction card to search the top 10 cards of your deck for a Weapon or Item attachment, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

cards.name: The Eyrie
cards.text: Reaction: After a phase begins, kneel The Eyrie to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character cannot be killed.

cards.name: Nightmares
cards.text: Action: Choose a character or location. Until the end of the phase, treat that card's printed text box as if it were blank (except for Traits).
cards.flavor: Yet in his nightmare he faced it again...

cards.name: Famine
cards.text: Increase the cost for each opponent to marshal each of his or her characters by 1.
